title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A journey of self-discovery and following your dreams, this novel follows Santiago, a young shepherd, as he travels from Spain to Egypt in search of treasure, learning life lessons along the way.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A spiritual guide to help you discover your true self by living in the present moment, breaking free from the tyranny of your thoughts and ego.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A sweeping history of humankind, exploring how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world and how our cultures, beliefs, and technologies have evolved over time.
